meanings.definition: A sensory receptor that responds to mechanical pressure or distortion, such as those found in the skin and inner ear.
meanings.sent1: The mechanoreceptor in my skin helps me feel when someone touches me gently.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study mechanoreceptors to understand how our bodies sense touch and pressure.
meanings.sent3: The mechanoreceptor in the skin must have been on vacation when I accidentally touched a hot pan.
meanings.sent4: Her mechanoreceptor for detecting vibrations was so sensitive, she could feel a train approaching from far away.
meanings.sent5: The mechanoreceptor in the inner ear is like a tiny alarm system, warning us of loud noises.
